Title: Halter Top Evening Dress with Cut Outs

Featured-image: 8929-mint-halter-top-evening-dress-with-cut-outs_p.jpg

----

Description: Halter top bodice features peek-a-boo cutout at the bust and the back of the bodice is a razor back with four straps that are all beaded and the beaded design flows into the front of the bodice and trims the waistline. A sheer layer covers the cutouts on the sides of the waistline. The flowy long skirt falls to the floor.
